titleInfo.title: Letter, W.S. Doak in Knoxville, Tenn., to J.G.M. Ramsey in Knoxville, Tenn. 1872 Oct. 8

mods.abstract: W.S. Doak replied on Oct. 8, 1872 to a Sept. 17th letter written by J.G.M. Ramsey. He sent Ramsey news that a monument would be raised to his father, Samuel W. Doak, in Greeneville and an account of how this all came about. He asked Ramsey to send some facts about Samuel's character to a Dr. Wills who would deliver the address at this ceremony. W.S. sent Ramsey some facts about Tusculum College and mentioned its merger with Greeneville College. He enclosed a list of the current trustees with his letter. He invited Ramsey to the ceremony and for a visit to his house.

subject.topic: Universities and colleges -- Tennessee -- Greenville -- History..
Ramsey, J. G. M. (James Gettys Mcgready), 1797-1884 -- Correspondence.
